#summary Alphabetical list of loaders
#labels Featured
|| *Command*                            || *Description* ||
||[CvsExtension            cvs         ]|| Perform a CVS checkout ||
||[BaseExtension           mkdir       ]|| Make a new, empty directory ||
||[SvnExtension            svn         ]|| Perform a Subversion checkout ||
||[HgExtension             hg          ]|| Perform a Mercurial clone ||
||[BaseExtension           untar       ]|| Untar a tarball ||
||[QuiltExtension          quilt       ]|| Set up to handle a patch series ||
